name: Ragnarok Remastered: A Mythic Hating Sim
name_original: Ragnarok Remastered: A Mythic Hating Sim
description:
Ragnarok is coming, and there's only one way to stop it... Through seduction! 

Play as the heroic God of Thunder himself, Thor, as you charm your way into the hearts of the greatest monsters of mythology. Don't get too attached, though... Your goal is not to bed these monsters, but to slay them instead! 

  • Jam-packed with references to Norse mythology!
  •  4 unique foes to vanquish (or vankiss???)!
  • 14 total scenes!
  • 3 different endings!
Credits

Programming by HAQ

Art by CritterClown

Writing by HAQ & CritterClown

Music from Bensounds
